causal_fidelity.target: Undertrained zone shows 2-3x higher risk per load unit
causal_fidelity.interpretation: Strong evidence of PHYSIOLOGICAL VULNERABILITY in undertrained state. Athletes with ACWR < 0.8 show 2.6x higher injury risk per load unit compared to optimal zone, while high ACWR (>1.5) shows only 2.0x. This supports the detraining-tissue fragility hypothesis.

transferability.interpretation: Poor transfer - synthetic patterns do not match real data
